From this video's description...

This special cinematic was released to celebrate 100 subscribers! In case you're wondering, no Kerbals were harmed in the making of this video - nope, not even when the giant asteroid crashed into the Mun base. Oh wait... I'm not supposed to be telling you this kind of stuff - you're supposed to watch the video for yourself to find out!

Actually, you probably already knew that from this video's thumbnail.

Edited April 22, 2014 by Andrew Hansen

Thank you for this video.

You... mean that's not how you get into tall rockets?

Very nice video, well done.

You... mean that's not how you get into tall rockets?

Ahh... perhaps I should have changed the narraration for that section. What I meant was that the Kerbal struggled with the standard procedure for getting into tall rockets, which is to hover in an airplane and jump out when you're close enough. I tried a long time to actually do that successfully, but the Kerbal's weight makes the plane go off balance as soon as you go on EVA, making jumping instantly hard to do. But with a bit of video editing, I made it look almost realistic.

Edited April 22, 2014 by Andrew Hansen
